name: Algolia Search
body:
### What is this?
Hi all! Here you'll find an an example of a quick and dirty e-commerce search experience using [Algolia](https://www.algolia.com/) and a sample BestBuy dataset. 

### What's it made of?
The implementation uses:
* [The AlgoliaSearch JS API](https://www.algolia.com/doc/api-client/javascript#install-and-init)
* [Algolia instantsearch.js](https://community.algolia.com/instantsearch.js/)
* React
* Bootstrap SASS
* Grunt as a build tool

### Support or Contact
If you want to know more feel free to reach out!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
